newsitem.title: USA: Coachmen Inds files for 1.5 mln offering.
newsitem.headline: Coachmen Inds files for 1.5 mln offering.

text.p: Coachmen Industries Inc said on Tuesday it registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission a proposed 1.5 million share public offering.
An additional 250,000 shares were also registered to cover over-allotments, the company said in a statement.

Coachmen, which manufactures recreational vehicles, said proceeds would be used for general corporate purposes including working capital, spending for plant and equipment and for potential acquisitions.
Coachmen has about 15.1 million shares outstanding.
Underwriters are led by Oppenheimer & Co Inc.
